body: Which is exactly my point. Trump is *not* a fascist. In fact Nazis actually believe him to be a jewish shill (נאצים טיפשים). I don't care for Trump but he's not an alt-right lunatic like the media portrays him. He's a populist, someone who embodies an anti-establishment campaign in a cocky manner that appeals to the masses. I think he's a real jerk and he can be authoritarian about some things because he's *always* right and the greatest and can never be wrong so everyone should just listen to him <sup>/s</sup>, but he isn't out to be a dictator and control people in general, he's pretty much just pursuing his own agenda and doesn't care what the hell anyone else does as long as they don't get in his way. He isn't a racist or phobic either, even though he gives insults that make him sound like it. He couldn't care less as long as he wins. I do however admire his zeal to get rid of corrupt powers and I think he does have an honest motive to save America and the people, even though he can't be fully trusted for reasons I outlined above.
body_html: Which is exactly my point. Trump is not a fascist. In fact Nazis actually believe him to be a jewish shill (נאצים טיפשים). I don't care for Trump but he's not an alt-right lunatic like the media portrays him. He's a populist, someone who embodies an anti-establishment campaign in a cocky manner that appeals to the masses. I think he's a real jerk and he can be authoritarian about some things because he's always right and the greatest and can never be wrong so everyone should just listen to him /s, but he isn't out to be a dictator and control people in general, he's pretty much just pursuing his own agenda and doesn't care what the hell anyone else does as long as they don't get in his way. He isn't a racist or phobic either, even though he gives insults that make him sound like it. He couldn't care less as long as he wins. I do however admire his zeal to get rid of corrupt powers and I think he does have an honest motive to save America and the people, even though he can't be fully trusted for reasons I outlined above.

post.title: Oh so NOW they admit the alt-right hates Trump

body:
Where the right always fucks up is not using the narrative to their advantages. The very name is problematic. If they went with Grannies For Trump as the name, then there's less way for the media to frame them as the bad guys. 

"Radical far right group Grannies for Trump were involved in a physical altercation on Tuesday with Biden supporters."  Pause for a moment and consider the mental picture that kind of headline paints. That's how you win hearts and minds, people are dumb and lazy these days and rarely read the articles for substance anymore. It's all headlines, memes, and 24/7 news channels with pundits telling people what to think.
